title: Drzony13's Epic Art Page
content:

[[div class="flavorbox"]]

[[module CSS]]
 :root{

     --header-title: "SCP FOUNDATION";
     --header-subtitle: "Secure - Contain - Protect";

     --lgurl: url(https://i.imgur.com/o2GETvf.png);

     --accentColor: hsl(270, 94%, 59%);
     --accentColorLite: hsla(270, 88%, 69%, 0.53);
     --hue: 134deg;
     --bgColor: #0c0c27;
     --fgColor: #090118;
}
[[/module]]


[[div class="meta-title"]]
Drzony13's Epic Art Page
[[/div]]


[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]



[[=]]
Hey there! I am Drzony13, but you can call me Drzony13! I'm a SPOOKY SCARY Ghooost! And a writer on [http://scp-pl.wikidot.com SCP-PL][[footnote]]Which is honestly even more scary.[[/footnote]] and here is my SUPER DUPER ULTRA EPIC art page!
[[/=]]

[[include component:image-block
| name=https://i.imgur.com/aBGkbo5.png
| caption=Here I am!
| align=center]]

So twist your hats backwards and come with me fellow kids, cause WE'RE GOIN' FOR A RIDE! Yyyy... YOOO!

[[collapsible show="SCP-EN art" hide="Ya can close it whenever you want to"]]

[[=]]

[[div style="display: block ; border : solid 2px var(--accentColor) ; background :var(--fgColor); margin-left : auto ; margin-right : auto ; width : 500px ; padding:10px ;; padding-top:5px ; padding-bottom:5px"]]

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/7HruZ8R.jpg]]
------
[[=]]
Portrait of O5-4 from [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/ralliston-s-proposal Ralliston's 001 Proposal]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

------
[[=]]
Cursed Queen Mab from [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/ralliston-s-proposal Ralliston's 001 Proposal], highly inspired by [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/cos-tu-smierdzi Something's Fishy]. Hey, don't look at me like that! [[*user Zygard]] forced me to make this!
[[/=]]

------

Drawing of [[[SCP-999]]] I made with dry pastels.
[[/=]]

Well, yeah, as you can see, there's not much here, but hey! This page will[[footnote]]probably[[/footnote]] be updated, so there[[footnote]]still probably[[/footnote]] WILL BE MORE!
